mods.abstract: RUNAWAY. WAS committed to the Jail of this parish a negro slave, aged about 27 years, about 5 feet 9 or 10 inches high. Says his name is SAM and that he belongs to Mr. Lovet Brown, of Shelby county, Texas. The owner will come forward, prove property, pay charges, and take him away or he will be dealt with according to Law. J. B. PLAISANCE, Jailor. s25-3i

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
